titleStmt.title: The life of faith by Samuel Ward ...
titleStmt.author: Ward, Samuel, 1577-1640.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected and amended.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Augustine Mathewes, for Iohn Marriot and Iohn Grismand, and are to be sold at their shops in Saint Dunstons Church-yard, and in Pauls Alley at the signe of the Gunne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
